word:
"I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that He is able to keep that which I have committed unto Him against that day." Not even to angels 


                                     -101- 

can we commit this precious soul which Christ has valued of such a price that He died to redeem it, died that it should not perish. While the angels can and do minister unto all who are heirs of salvation, they are to be our faithful sentinels lest Satan should destroy us.
